summary:
- **Document Type**: Appendix 3G (Notification of unquoted securities issuance)  
- **Securities Issued**: 29,766 unlisted Share Rights (GMDAAF) under employee incentive scheme  
- **Recipients**: Non-executive directors (including Anthony Kiernan, Gerard Kaczmarek, Jacqueline Murray, Michael Bowen)  
- **Vesting Condition**: Rights vest if directors remain in position until 30 June 2026  
- **Purpose**: Part of FY2025 director fee substitution (approved by shareholders in 2023)  
- **Total Ordinary Shares Outstanding**: 1,130,548,057 (GMD)  
- **Unquoted Securities Outstanding**:  
  - 14,680,000 options (GMDAZ)  
  - 13,508,000 Retention Rights (GMDAAD)  
  - 9,901,611 Performance Rights (GMDAAE)  

No material trading or capital structure impact (routine director incentive issuance).
